products.name: Boots
products.description: Just a plain boots to wear on your powerful heroic legs. Made from leather, comfortable enough.

products.name: Strength potion
products.description: You want to get you muscles bigger? Just drink this thing and gain +5 STR for 5 minutes!

products.name: Sword
products.description: An iron sword to cut your enemies' heads. Easy to use and pretty common item.

products.name: Gloves
products.description: A pair of leather gloves, nothing special. Helps you to keep your hands less dirty.

products.name: Boots of better
products.description: Is just a boots but a bit better than the plain boots. All the village girls will like these boots.

products.name: Healing potion
products.description: Some spider or maybe a wolf bit your ankle? Try this liquid out to heal your wounds. But I'd recommend you wearing some boots next time.

products.name: Trousers
products.description: You better acquire a pair of these. Have you seen any heroes running around in underwear only? Yeah, I know you saw some of them, but have you seen them again?

products.name: Helmet
products.description: This peace of steel will probably save your life if you get hit with some stick or small rock. But don't rely on it if you encounter ogres with their massive clubs.

products.name: Green healing potion
products.description: This healing potion is green! Probably it heals more health per use. Or less, I'm not sure.

products.name: Lady gloves
products.description: These gloves are for ladies and definitely not for muscular heroic men.

products.name: Quick boots
products.description: These boots for ones who want to go fast! They colored red, that's why they go faster than usual ones!

products.name: Hard helmet
products.description: This helmet feels much harder than the regular helmet, also it weighs more. But probably it would help you to survive a hit from an ogre club.

products.name: Small sword
products.description: Smol sword. For those who want smaller swords.

products.name: Armor
products.description: Finally some armor steel armor! But what's wrong with this price? Why is it so expensive&

products.name: Herbs
products.description: Various herbs for your druidic purposes.
